remarks: Lemma for ~ tchcph : real closure of an inner product of a vector with itself.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Oct-2015.)
statement:
tchval.n $e |- G = ( toCHil ` W ) $.
tchcph.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
tchcph.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
tchcph.1 $e |- ( ph -> W e. PreHil ) $.
tchcph.2 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) $.
tchcph.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
tchcphlem3 $p |- ( ( ph /\ X e. V ) -> ( X ., X ) e. RR ) $.
